Package com.croc

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Bishop
    Class for chess bishop - figure
    Board
    Class for storing taken positions of board and checking illegal turns
    Figure
    Abstract class for chess figures
    King
    Class for chess king - figure
    Knight
    Class for chess knight - figure
    Main
    Class with entry point
    Pawn
    Class for chess pawn - Figure

    Class for chess quin - figure

  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    IllegalTurnException
    Exception class for not supported tuns of figures Throw when figure can't do a turn
    OutOfBoardException
    Exception for turning out chess board Throw when turn coordinates are illegal
    TakenPositionException
    Exception for turning to taken position Throw when turn coordinates are taken
